Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with top-quality materials and features to meet your needs. Given its value and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $80 to you. Considering its worth to both us and you, I propose to sell it to you for $95. This price reflects the product's high quality and the opportunity to own something truly exceptional. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
